metadata.title: USN-4897-1 -- Pygments vulnerability
metadata.description: Ben Caller discovered that Pygments incorrectly handled parsing certain files. If a user or automated system were tricked into parsing a specially crafted file, a remote attacker could cause Pygments to hang or consume resources, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4897-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-pygments-doc - 2.3.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.2 python3-pygments - 2.3.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.2 python-pygments - 2.3.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.2 No subscription required
